a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTPolioIPVOnlyLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Polio.IPV-only) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a poliovirus vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Inactivated polio vaccine (IPV)-only (in countries, in polio-free regions, with a very low risk of importation and sustained high routine immunization coverage (third dose of the diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis vaccine [DTP3] > 90%) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTPolioIPVOnlyLogic

Patient
Patient

a:t.value: Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "No poliovirus primary series doses were administered"

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Shold not vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client\'s age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first IPV dose.'
"Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the third dose.'

then.value: Shold not vaccinate client with first IPV dose as client's age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first IPV dose.

when.name: Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with third IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver when to come back for the third dose.
